Title: Mangalagiri in new hues
Content: Dastkar Andhra exhibition, on in the city, showcases saris, dupattas and yardage in diverse designs. The works of the weavers from various parts of Andhra — Pasalapadi, East Godavari, Ponduru, Srikaik
Author: Pushpa Chari
Description: Dastkar Andhra exhibition, on in the city, showcases saris, dupattas and yardage in diverse designs. The works of the weavers from various parts of Andhra — Pasalapadi, East Godavari, Ponduru, Srikaik
